channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SD

item.title: Report X-2023081093
item.description:
Report X-2023081093

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T03:11:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-08
  • City: WATERTOWN
  • State: SD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was sorted to modular dock and due to amount of packages on the rollers it fell off the rollers. Unable to ascertain if package was damaged before this occurred. DescribePack: Top of drum was dented and then leaked. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bag and tote then placed outside to avoid having fumes in the building. All doors were opened and exhaust fans were turned on.
